commands: take old key from chest drawer
unlock wooden door with old key
take old key from chest drawer
unlock wooden door with old key

infos.name: kitchen
infos.desc:
You arrive in a kitchen. A standard one.

 You see a refrigerator. You check the price tag that's still affixed to the refrigerator. 100 bucks? What a deal! You'll have to ask where they got this![if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The refrigerator contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] The refrigerator is empty! What a waste of a day![end if] You see a counter. The counter is typical.[if there is something on the s_1] On the counter you can see [a list of things on the s_1].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1] But the thing hasn't got anything on it.[end if] Look out! It's a- oh, never mind, it's just a stove. [if there is something on the s_2]You see [a list of things on the s_2] on the stove.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2]But there isn't a thing on it.[end if] Look over there! a kitchen island. You wonder idly who left that here. The kitchen island is usual.[if there is something on the s_3] On the kitchen island you see [a list of things on the s_3].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3] But the thing is empty, unfortunately. Oh! Why couldn't there just be stuff on it?[end if]

 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] screen door leading east. There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] wooden door leading west. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: bedroom
infos.desc:
You are in a bedroom. A standard kind of place.

 You can make out a chest drawer. There's something strange about this being here, but you can't put your finger on it.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The chest drawer contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] The chest drawer is empty! What a waste of a day![end if] You see [if c_1 is locked]a locked[else if c_1 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] antique trunk close by.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The antique trunk contains [a list of things in the c_1]. There's something strange about this being here, but you can't put your finger on it.[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] The antique trunk is empty! What a waste of a day![end if] Look over there! a king-size bed. [if there is something on the s_0]On the king-size bed you see [a list of things on the s_0].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0]The king-size bed appears to be empty.[end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] wooden door leading east.

infos.name: backyard
infos.desc:
You've entered a backyard. You can barely contain your excitement.

 You scan the room for a set of chairs, and you find a set of chairs! The set of chairs is typical.[if there is something on the s_10] On the set of chairs you can see [a list of things on the s_10].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_10] But the thing is empty. What, you think everything in TextWorld should have stuff on it?[end if] What's that over there? It looks like it's a bbq. I guess it's true what they say, if you're looking for a bbq, go to TextWorld. [if there is something on the s_8]On the bbq you see [a list of things on the s_8].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_8]However, the bbq, like an empty bbq, has nothing on it.[end if] You can see a patio table. The patio table is normal.[if there is something on the s_9] On the patio table you see [a list of things on the s_9].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_9] But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of junk.[end if]

 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] screen door leading west. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: living room
infos.desc:
You're now in a living room.

 You can see a couch. [if there is something on the s_5]On the couch you make out [a list of things on the s_5].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_5]But the thing is empty, unfortunately.[end if] You smell an intriguing smell, and follow it to a low table. The low table is ordinary.[if there is something on the s_6] On the low table you see [a list of things on the s_6]. Huh, weird.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_6] However, the low table, like an empty low table, has nothing on it.[end if] You can see a tv. Wow, isn't TextWorld just the best? [if there is something on the s_7]On the tv you see [a list of things on the s_7].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_7]But the thing is empty, unfortunately. Hm. Oh well[end if]

There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: bathroom
infos.desc:
You are in a bathroom. A normal one.

 You make out [if c_3 is locked]a locked[else if c_3 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] toilet right there by you.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The toilet contains [a list of things in the c_3].[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] The toilet is empty! What a waste of a day![end if] You see a bath.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The bath contains [a list of things in the c_4].[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] The bath is empty, what a horrible day![end if] You make out a sink. The sink is standard.[if there is something on the s_4] On the sink you make out [a list of things on the s_4].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4] But the thing hasn't got anything on it.[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: garden
infos.desc:
I am so happy to announce that you are now in the garden. You begin to take stock of what's here.



You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: wooden door
infos.desc: it is what it is, a wooden door [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.desc: it is what it is, a screen door [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: chest drawer
infos.desc: The chest drawer looks strong, and impossible to crack. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]
